text: The 1947 Santa Clara Broncos football team was an American football team that represented Santa Clara University during the 1947 college football season. In its second season under head coach Len Casanova, the team compiled a 4–4 record and was outscored by a total of 158 to 109. The team played its three home games at Kezar Stadium at San Francisco. ==Schedule== ==References== Santa Clara Category:Santa Clara Broncos football seasons Santa Clara Broncos football
title: 1947 Santa Clara Broncos football team
